sentences.english: Objective To study the application value of the small opacity profusion in pneumoconiosis diagnosis criterion.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討塵肺診斷標準中小陰影密集度的應用價值。

sentences.english: Objective The economic and social benefits of welder pneumoconiosis prevention were studied.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討電焊工塵肺預防的經濟效益和社會效益。

sentences.english: Pneumoconiosis is the most severe occupational disease for industrial production in Chi- na.
sentences.chinese: 塵肺是我國工業生產中危害最嚴重的職業病。

sentences.english: These factors add difficulty to the early diagnoses of pneumoconiosis.
sentences.chinese: 這些因素給塵肺的早期診斷帶來了難度。

sentences.english: Objective To study the historical prevalent regularity and medium long term prediction of pneumoconiosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的對塵肺的歷史流行規律和中長期預測進行研究。

sentences.english: Results The early common pathological change of alumina pneumoconiosis was the dust spots.
sentences.chinese: 結果粉塵沉積性塵斑是鋁礬土塵肺最常見的塵性病變。

sentences.english: Objective To study dynamic change of pneumoconiosis cases in a nonferrous metal company over 50 years.
sentences.chinese: 探討某有色金屬公司50年來塵肺病發病的動態變化。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical outcomes of whole lung lavage for the therapy of pneumoconiosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討全肺灌洗術塵肺病的臨牀效果。

sentences.english: Conclusion The key of decreasing disease burden is that welder pneumoconiosis being prevented.
sentences.chinese: 結論預防電焊工塵肺發病是減少其疾病負擔的關鍵。

sentences.english: In addition, the presence of pleural effusion would be more in keeping with LC than sarcoidosis or silicosis.
sentences.chinese: 另外，LC的胸膜滲出常較結節病和煤塵肺多見。

sentences.english: Conclusion late staged pneumonoconiosis is one of the best indication for isolated lung transplantation.
sentences.chinese: 結論單肺移植是治療晚期塵肺的最佳適應症之一。

sentences.english: So the key to control is to prevent.
sentences.chinese: 因此，控制塵肺病的關鍵是預防。

sentences.english: Objective Investigated the manangement and effect of anesthesia of lung lavage in patients with pneumonoconiosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討塵肺患者肺灌洗術的麻醉管理方法。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the level of pneumoconiosis incidence at present.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究當前廠礦中塵肺發病率水平。

sentences.english: Conclusion BAL would be useful in early and acute pneumoconiosis treatment.
sentences.chinese: 結論BAL擬用於早期和急性塵肺的治療。

sentences.english: The morbidity of pneumoconiosis is closely related with the accumulated dust content.
sentences.chinese: 結論塵肺病發病率與累積接塵量有直接關係。
